website_summaries.verdict: With an instant pop-up feature that’s perfect for harried parents, this sun shelter can be up and corralling toddlers in less than a minute.
pros: Pops up quickly into a sun shelter that can protect up to 4 people at once
Large storage pockets on side walls hold extra gear, sandbags, or clean diapers
Back wall unzips and rolls up for maximum ventilation
cons: Does not stay up in strong wind
No floor (although some may see that as a pro)

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Served Its Purpose!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the purchase of this tent. We got it for the sole purpose of a cover for our little one at the beach. We all ended up spending quit a bit of time in it! Our whole family could fit under it pretty comfortably. There was also room to put all of our stuff under it (so it was out of the sun). We also used the sand pockets to hold all of our flip flops and beach clothes. I'd definitely recommend this tent for any outdoor activity if you have little ones. (I'd recommend practicing folding it back up just a few times. We did and had NO issues when we used it.)
customer_reviews.author: Delilah

customer_reviews.title: Great Beach Tent!
customer_reviews.text: Great pop up tent for the beach! I used it today for the first time and had many compliments and people asking where I got it. It held up very well to the wind and was super easy to set up and put away. I am glad I practiced once before taking it to the beach though because it made the process much better. I’m very happy with my purchase. My only concern and I say this hoping that it never becomes an issue but I could tell it was pulling quite a bit at the very top so I’m hoping the stitching lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy, quality, easy to use tent!
customer_reviews.text: For a mom of a 2 year old and a 1 year old- this was such a great purchase! I wouldn't have been able to get a tent with poles and stakes put together quickly enough to keep two toddlers in my reach. This tent takes 15 seconds to pop open on the beach- and once you get the hang of it, it takes about one minute to take it down and get it back into the carrier. Super lightweight. Sturdy on windy days (deep pockets along both sides that you fill with sand). Side windows give great ventilation. This was such an awesome addition to our "beach gear".
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: Easiest up and down shade I’ve seen
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never written a review but I love this sun shade. I can put it up and down by myself. I usually go to the beach with a two year old and so far no problems. I like that it has an open floor. My son plays in the sand in the shade. It’s stayed put in moderate wind. I’m sure it wouldn’t work in any strong wind but so far so good. We live in Florida so I’m sure it’s going to get a lot of use
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get the Shade Shack!
customer_reviews.text: I researched products like these. Here is what I love about: set up is simple. It fits two adults comfortably and one adult perfectly. It doesn't blow around and it is easy to stabilize it. I live in Florida: you need protection from the sun. This let the breeze in and the sun out. It is also easy to fold back up once you get the hang of it. I practiced in my living room the day before the beach and had no problem at all folding it all back up. (I'm 64 and no mechanical genius). Also, it weighs next to nothing. You carry it over your shoulder like a hand bag. This is the best invention ever!
customer_reviews.author: Blender User

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate to purchase - it’s a must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love our shade shack!!!! I cannot imagine going to the beach without it and we are five houses from the beach so we are there daily in the summer months. It is so convenient and provides a comfortable solution for shade with room for a handful of people. It’s wonderful. Read the instructions on how to wrap it back up!!!! If u do - it’s a breeze. Also easy to secure to ground - scoop sand into the side pockets and you are done. Never ever had an issue with it blowing away or over in higher winds.
customer_reviews.author: CCJW

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE for Beach Day!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever leave reviews, but this tent is definitely gonna be the exception. I read extensively the reviews prior to purchasing the XL version of the Shade Shack, and the reviewers were correct! The Shade Shack is effortless to erect and very easy to take down. When my partner and I are at the beach, it feels like we’re in our own private cabana. I wouldn’t hesitate to purchase this item again, and couldn’t think about hitting up the beach without it. If you’re looking for a shade tent for your beach day getaway(s), you should definitely give the Shade Shack a try. I promise you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy and lightweight pop up tent
customer_reviews.text: After looking at reviews I decided to buy this because I needed something easy to use that would just pop open and not heavy to carry around. I'm happy with my purchase. The only recommendation I would make is to make sure you buy a sand proof mat of some sort because this doesn't come with one. Folding it back in place is easy, I had to follow the instructions a couple of times to get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: SaRita Lola

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we love to go to the beach and this can be used anywhere we go. To the park the back yard camping. And I really like that its easy to fold. It took me a couple tries but I got it down. It kinda reminds me of the windshield sun visor the ring kind. I really enjoyed it and would recommend this to friends and family. My sisters all liked it once they saw it and asked me where I bought it. Since we are all at home now I buy everything online now. We don't go out to the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. I have an 8 month old and with all the other things I need to drag to the beach this tent makes my life super easy. It comes in an easy carry case it’s so slim it actually fits inside my beach bag. I’ve used this tent twice. Yesterday was a very windy day and it held up perfectly! The construction seems well made . I will be recommending this to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!! I JUST ADDED SAND AND IT STOOD. THIS IS GREAT! INWOULD RECOMMEND THIS TO EVEYERONE! Easy to open and very easy to close.
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Vey easy to fill large side pockets for putting sand in, to hold it down. Taking down and refolding to put back in very convenient zipper sleeve takes some practice. Helps to have long arms or Easier with 2 people. Serves the purpose very nicely. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Consumer!

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to carry and unfold. Almost blew away several times. Thanks to digging the sand to weigh it down it ended up swarmed in biting sand flies. Couldn’t get it to fold flat again and ended up trashing it on the beach. Awful product!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: We love this tent and so our children
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I got. The first one lasted 2.5 years. I use it at the beach to allow my children to play as much time as possible in the shadow. My wife and I also got in to get protected from the sun. We love this tent and so our children. Easy to assemble and even easier to move it to a different location once assembled if the kids decide to play in a different spot. It is not that great under windy conditions. You have to use strings to keep it up and running. We usually don't use it under heavy wind.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan_U

customer_reviews.title: Practice folding at home
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this pop up tent. Goes up in a flash and seats two comfortably. This is my second one. First one was used for years. Had to replace it because my husband tried to fold it up and mangled it. Once you get the hang of folding its so easy to put back in its bag. But don't force it or it will break. Works we'll even on windy days and lets breezes flow thru. Provides great sun protection and is lightweight. Practice folding at home. It takes a few tries and I think there's a video on line.
customer_reviews.author: maryad735

customer_reviews.title: Protect skin in the shade!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson visiting us in Florida. Had to get a tent.. The umbrellas blow away! Had a great experience. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M. Giddings

customer_reviews.title: Practice Folding
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me to take over to the beach. Allows protection from both the sun and wind. It is light weight, totally easy to open and with practice, pretty easy to fold back up. I recommend following the instructions and practice folding the shade a few times at home before taking it to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a young family with one baby
customer_reviews.text: Finally took this to the beach yesterday, I have to say I’m very pleased. Easy set up and take down, directions are pretty straightforward. I wasn’t a fan of scooping sand into the pockets, we ended up using firewood to keep it down because of the windy So Cal weather but it held up and my son had a nice spot to hide from the sun. It held his beach bassinet and 2 chairs semi comfortably, if you need more space, get the larger model. Also, it’s not that high either, the bigger model is supposed to be taller. Our chairs are very low to the ground, so it was fine for us.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieK

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product to take to the beach so that my dog could have shade. The Shade Shack is super easy to unfold and set up. Typically we just fill sand in the pockets on the side and that thing does NOT move, even with the beachy wind. Putting it away is a breeze too! Highly recommend for a little family or even for your dog! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Hallee Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Best 50 bucks we ever spent. Took our Lab to our favorite Baja beach house and the shade shack was a godsend. If we let her, our Abby would swim to retrieve sticks until she couldn’t walk the next day. This allowed us to wedge her inside the tent with our beach chairs so she had to choice but to rest in the shade. My husband watched the video and had no issues putting it up or talking it down. It was pretty windy but the semi-wet sand kept the shelter stable. Brilliant to have no floor and also to be able to unzip the back and tie back the sides for air. Look no further and LLVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy R.

customer_reviews.title: It’s coming apart after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: As a single Mom of a toddler, that lives on the beach, I can protect him quickly without taking my eyes off him but after only 3 uses the top crisscrossing stitches have come undone! I’m guessing spending $75 is not going to be viable for long!
customer_reviews.author: Lori S Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Worked in our boat
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a sturdy shelter we could set up in our ski boat when we wanted to park and swim, as our Bimini cover broke and has to be replaced. This worked great! It was the only shelter I could find without a floor, so it is so easy to set up and conforms to the shape of the boat. The zipper in the back was definitely a plus. It is larger than other shelters we have bought for the beach in the past, and it worked great on the beach because it is less messy to clean up. We might even buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Albornoz

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Do not buy this. It is absolutely horrible and impossible to fold back in its case. It has a video that tells you how to put it back but if I'm on a beach vacation I don't want a product that requires a video. Two men on the beach spent 10 minutes figuring out how to get it back in the case. It was definitely not a one-man job. Plus it was pretty flimsy when we set up. Definitely returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amaz123

customer_reviews.title: Cannot handle beach wind.
customer_reviews.text: The pop-up feature is great, the portability is great, it folds easily. Unfortunately, it’s completely useless at the beach since it cannot withstand wind. I cut my beach trip short because I was ill-prepared with this product. Next time, I’ll purchase a sun shade with a middle reinforcement, and spend the extra money for one. Only use this product in a non-windy outdoor situation. The representation of using it at the beach is false advertising. The beach has wind. This product can not sustain wind.
customer_reviews.author: Jacy

customer_reviews.title: Not useful at the beach
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressed by this little pop up. We had tried a similar item previously with no luck and this wasn’t much better. If you just want to use it in the park on grass then maybe it’s okay. For beach use though, the stakes are not nearly long enough to get a get hold in the ground, and this thing simply can’t hold up to the coastal wind of a beach.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: ... looking for and the quality of the product doesn't disappoint. I am using this for shade at my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for and the quality of the product doesn't disappoint. I am using this for shade at my older kids' outside sports and this is the perfect thing. It is a lot bigger than I was anticipating so I was happy that I can fit many family members along with the baby under it. Definitely practice folding it many times at home before taking it out.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy up and plenty of shade!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Beach Tent that I have ever owned and we have gone through many over the years. It is so easy to put up and take down. Also, it stays put and the XL provides plenty of shade. I like the fact the it has pockets to fill with sand to help with stability. And the roll up side windows are easy because they have toggle closures, not ties. It is not good for windy days, but perfect for calm days at the beach. We have used it everyday for the past two weeks at the beach and it has certainly been worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel M. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It’s SO easy to unfold and then pack again. We used it at the beach and it was perfect. The zipper in the back is great for letting a breeze in. You can stake it down or fill the pockets with sand
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to fold/unfold
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Shade Shack to use it on the beach. It pops up on its own, so no trouble there. I had to watch a youtube video to see how to hold it, but once I managed once, it was a piece of cake. The tent withstood some considerable wind after the pockets were filled with sand, so I would rate it as durable and sturdy. I was able to open and fold it on my own even in windy weather. Overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mariya Atanasova

customer_reviews.title: Great size and just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This beach tent is the perfect beach or backyard companion. It opens up simply and is a great size. There is a zipper on the back to open completely and no floor which is great for the beach. Closing it up is definitely a little bit of a challenge, but it just takes some practice. It's not too big when in the bag either, maybe 2 feet in diameter and quite thin, which makes it easy to transport. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: tracey

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this tent for almost 8 years and I can say that is really easy to assemble, at the beginning it is hard to find the way to put it back on the bag, but once you learn the correct way to do it once. You never forget. I like the pockets to add sand to keep it safe from winds. I will recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sada

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: We decided on a last minute beach trip and knew we needed something to protect us from the sun. After looking at the pricy ones we picked this sun shade. It worked very well for my family of 5. Very easy to set up and take down. I like that it folds back up with my large family when we can save room in the car thats always a plus. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a less expensive sun shade. I know we will be using it many times in the future.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product that I've used for the past 9 years
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in 2013 for a beach trip, and we've used it every year since. Very light weight, and folds into a small size for travel. I like that this has an open bottom so you can sit in the sand. The side pockets are great to fill with sand, and I've seen the Shade Shack withstand strong winds on the gulf coast. Folding the Shade Shack takes some practice, which is my only criticism.
customer_reviews.author: Erika E

customer_reviews.title: loved it, but ripping after 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: We loved the shade shack, but unfortunately it will need to be thrown in the trash soon since its ripping all along the bottom exposing the metal frame. I have reached out to the company....lets see how they resolve this.
customer_reviews.author: Laurenj

customer_reviews.title: Great shade tent while on beach
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for our beach vacation!!! It pops up super easy. Just put sand in side pockets to weigh it down. A little tricky taking it down and folding it ,but once you get the hang of it...it's not bad at all. The only draw back at all is if it is real windy, it leans. One day we didn't put it up due to wind,but saw other people taking down gazebos, umbrellas etc. that day, too. I'm glad a bought this. Good investment!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Take down is horrible
customer_reviews.text: The easy set up and carrying case was what sold me on this product. The downfall is putting the thing away. This does not seem like it will ever go back to its original bag. I struggled with it for 15 mins on the beach til I gave up and tossed in my car as small as I could get it and threw a bag on it to hold it. I won't be bringing this to the beach anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love this Item
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely loved this item! We used it on the beach for our vacation and it was super easy. Watch the video on how to put it back in the bag, that is key! I watched the video several times so I would be able to do it. One day at the beach it was very windy and this stayed right in place. You put sand in the pockets and it works great! We are two adults and a husky, so there was room for us all! I highly recommend this shade!
customer_reviews.author: Norma J. Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adults and kids
customer_reviews.text: I saw this last year and bought it for my family. We love it. Its a great alternative to an umbrella and won't blow away! It pops open (it took me a few times to figure out how to close it) and fill the sides with sand to keep it in place. We love the beach but fair skin can't take too much sun. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Don't go to the beach without one!
customer_reviews.text: Took this to the beach and just love it. Set up was super-easy and putting damp sand in the pockets held it down nicely on a moderately windy day. It easily fit two adults. A third could have squeezed in if need be. I picked this one over the other options b/c it did *not* have a floor, something that might also appeal to people with kids who want to play in the sand but still be under cover. Closing it was almost as easy as opening it - just had to look at the directions that came with it for a minute.
customer_reviews.author: germantownmom

customer_reviews.title: I loved it on the beach with its purpose of shade
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago for us to use on the beach with our infant. I loved it on the beach with its purpose of shade. I would've given this 5 stars up until it was time to pack up and go. I watched my husband attempt to fold this thing it became hilarious. This was impossible for us to fold back into its bag. When we got home I attempted to do this myself (even after watching a video off youtube) and I still couldn't get it down. Fail on folding back to store otherwise this would've gotten 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MVB

customer_reviews.title: FUN IN THE SHADE
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something for the beach - I was not sure if I wanted the large of the XL - we got the XL and it is perfect for us. You definitely have to practice folding it (at home) before using it - or watch their video. We recommend this !
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P.

customer_reviews.title: This beach tent is so perfect for long days at the beach
customer_reviews.text: This beach tent is so perfect for long days at the beach... provides great sun protection for my young children. We have used on multiple beach vacations. It folds up very nicely (once you master how to fold it, that is!!), and is easy to travel with. Due to the light material, it doesn't stand up in strong winds, but that's to be expected! On typical nice, breezy beach days, we just need to turn/adjust it in the right direction so the wind doesn't catch it and knock it over. We fill Ziploc baggies with sand and place in the side pockets to weigh it down.. works great!!
customer_reviews.author: jpink2414

customer_reviews.title: Very easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product. We bought it for our beach trip. It's pretty large in size. You can fit 2-3 chairs under it. To keep the tent in place, you just out sand in the pockets on each side. Super easy to set up and take down!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Caradine

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but can break
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to unfold, set up, and use at beach. Provides great sun protection for wife and baby. However it's not that easy to unfold just takes patience. However mine broke as i was attempting to fold and put back into case. One side no longer stands up. There are instructions on how to fix however i cannot get it back. Used it three times before this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: works well and it's a good size, but minor improvements would make it perfect. The back flap zips open, but there is no way to keep it open. there is no loop or velcro to attach the flaps. Otherwise, it is almost perfect. Easy set up, easy tear down.
customer_reviews.author: TJ SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Video of fold up
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be intimidated by fold up! Super easy. Game changer for the beach for us! Lightweight, no more dragging around a giant tent. Check out my video to see real life fold up.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Made in the shade
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! Perfect for the beach. It barely weighs a thing when folded which is nice when you have so much beach stuff. And the XL is super roomy. There is a learning curve on refolding so DEFINITELY practice before you go out on your adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet_Tarte2

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and tear down, works great and is a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a trip to the beach with my toddler. It is lightweight and super easy to put up. I used the paper instructions and was able to take it down easily, too. The beach chairs and umbrellas at the resort where we stayed were $25 a day, so this tent paid for itself. As a tip, use grocery bags and put the sand in those to weight it - it makes for an easier tear down. You can also adjust the height of the tent by positioning the sides closer or farther apart. This was a great purchase and well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Runner Girl

customer_reviews.title: Ljp
customer_reviews.text: Never. Again. Went to the beach with my two kids after practicing using this at home. Blew half way across the beach in the wind. Wouldn’t say in the ground- it was like a giant kite. Then it took me 30 minutes in the wind to fold it up- I would have left it on the beach if it wasn’t going to blow and hit someone (Or if I could fit it in the trash). Sorry :(
customer_reviews.author: lisp

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my young daughters on the beach. A little tricky to fold back up and get in the bag but not too bad. Took me a couple times but eventually I got it. The sand pockets worked great. Even in stronger beach winds it didn't move. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the open bottom for toddler sand play. Too small for one adult and child.
customer_reviews.text: Great for toddler who likes to dig in the sand the whole time at the beach. I sat in the tent with him and felt it should be taller (I’m 5’5) and it felt hot inside unlike the Pacifica Easy Breeze tent. I had the back open but then the sun kept shining in and I closed it. Same with side windows. Too small for a toddler and one adult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for windy, sunny day at the beach
customer_reviews.text: This worked great on our recent beach trip. The first day was very windy, so we needed 2 people to hold the tent while a 3rd person put sand in the pockets. But once the sand was in the pockets, it held up great. We had studied the folding instructions before taking it to the beach and found it fairly easy to refold, even in the wind. I might add a couple of large clips or clamps to the bag for future use because the tie-backs for the back zippered wall had a hard time holding the flaps in place in the wind and the flaps would just whip around.
customer_reviews.author: sarahchaarli

customer_reviews.title: Practice, practice practice.
customer_reviews.text: I practiced at home before going on vacation and folding was a breeze! Fast forward to the beach. Time to go home, we are packing up and I CANNOT FOR THE LIFE OF ME get this thing to fold. With instructions and the video. Took it home unfolded. I'm sure people on the beach got a good laugh!
customer_reviews.author: MP99

customer_reviews.title: Super easy pop up tent! Great size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the beach because we have 2 small children. I liked that it opened up quickly and we didn’t need to fuss with poles. It is great because you can add sand to the sides so it won’t blow away! Super light and came with a carring case with handle for easy transport. Folding it up is a bit tricky, not a quick fold down. Ours did come with a big mark on the front but I’m unable to order a new one because we leave for vacation in 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: We used this as a sun shelter for my granddaughter at the beach. It worked great! Easy to set up, good design, and held up in very windy conditions. It was also easy to carry to the beach. The only difficulty is folding it up again. I was never able to do that at the beach, possibly due to the wind,so we would fold it in half and someone would carry it that way. Once away from the beach, after re-thinking the process, I was able to fold it up. It is rather ingenious, really, but not intuitive, at least not to me. All in all, this was an excellent product, and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ktmommablue

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used this over my infant son’s pack n play at the beach. Other kids joined him to get a break from the sun too. What’s great is it packs up neatly, comes with a shoulder bag to carry it, super fast set up & you can keep the end flaps open to allow for a breeze to blow through.
customer_reviews.author: CCThomas

customer_reviews.title: Easy up!  Easy down!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! 4 month old granddaughter came to visit at beach house. This was perfect. Her dad and her fell asleep in its sun protected shade! And I’m sun challenged so it’s perfect for me too. Easy up! Watch the video on how to close and it will be Easy down! We used sand in the sides and it was great. The side windows are a really nice size for breezes to come thru. And it’s light and easy to carry. Everything is just as the manufacturer said. Enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn DiLenge

customer_reviews.title: The BEST thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST thing I have ever bought for the beach. I have taken this thing everywhere with me. It fits in my son's suitcase. We've slept in it, changed in it, and played it in. The best part - it literally folds in less than 1 minute once you get the hang of the folding down. Read the instructions a few times and it's a cinch. People ask me all the time where I bought it. It even held up to Costa Rica surf beaches without any anchors besides the sand in the pockets. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: TM Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing!! So easy to fold and slide back into the zip up case! The sand to fill in the sides to weigh it down is probably my favorite part! We stuck a kid pool inside & they didn’t burn at all! It actually rained one day and 3 of us adults with two kids could fit inside perfect! HIGHLY recommend! You won’t be sorry!!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! no assembly required!
customer_reviews.text: This sun shelter is perfect for us. Used it in 15mph winds and it held strong. Was easy to set up. Simply popped it up once I took it from its carrying case. There are pockets on the side that you can fill with sand. It does have stakes and string if you need to anchor it that way. Two low beach chairs can fit underneath. The back has center zipper that you can open. I read complaints about how difficult it can be to break down but it was a breeze for me. I practiced twice at home. Its simple. It has detailed instruction sheet.
customer_reviews.author: munchy74

customer_reviews.title: Really big and nice!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something our whole family could sit under and this is it. Very easy to set up and very compact when stored. Definitely tricky to close the first few times, but I think that is worth it for the small size when stored.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: No fuss beach tent.
customer_reviews.text: We used this tent on a windy Florida beach day. I couldn't put it up by myself because it would have floated away! My husband had to hold it while I filled the sides up with sand. It still wanted to fly away so my husband had to stake down one side. After that we never had to touch the tent and it provided a nice shelter from the wind and sun for my infant daughters. Two one year old babies and two adults fit in the tent comfortably. Folding the tent when we were ready to leave was really easy and I liked how compact/light it was.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, needs sandbags for holding in place though
customer_reviews.text: Just opened this product for the first time at the beach. Unfortunately, the instructions to set it up were on a CD, so that was not very useful. However, it is simple enough to figure out on your own. The only reason it does not have 5 stars is that it comes with these small metal pegs/spikes that are supposed to be for putting into the ground. They are useless in sand. Even a small breeze will pull these out of the sand. I am looking for some sand bags to use instead.
customer_reviews.author: Katniss

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite Amazon finds!
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing find on Amazon for me. I use this for not just beach trips, but for soccer games, park visits, and poolside. It's great to pop up for some quick shade for myself or for my kid. You have to use a lower sand chair underneath the tent, but I'm fine with that or just using a mat. IT'S SO EASY to pop open and be ready to enjoy! I love that it folds up and you have a carry case for it. Nice for when you don't have a lot of hands to help you set up. It's also nice when you wanna pack up and go quickly.
customer_reviews.author: sbx

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sand pockets on the side, we didn’t even need the stakes. Bought this for the beach, put a pool under it for the kids and it kept them nice and cool! Once you get feel for folding it up it’s pretty simple! Loved the travel bag for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product - really
customer_reviews.text: Just used our Shade Shack for the first time and couldn't wait to get back home to write the review! Amazing product, beyond simple to put up - instant shade, fun, and enjoyment. It was a little difficult to tell the size from the photos but it's actually pretty roomy. Can't count how many compliments we received from people walking by. I want to get another one for my nephews! Great product - put it in your shopping cart now - you won't be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Akamine

customer_reviews.title: Tearing
customer_reviews.text: I love the product design. The fabric around the metal is already ripping apart. I am not sure how I will fix it as the material is very thin, it rubs along the sand or on the sidewalk and is torn on both sides the entire bottom. Any suggestions on how to fix it please pass it on to me. Thanks, Kathy
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Eidson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy fast setup & folding just watch video. Sand pockets work great. Good ventilation but when zipped closed protects from wind. Wish had front wings for more shade. Surprisingly convenient not to have floor as among other benefits makes it easy to move tent. Happy with it
customer_reviews.author: bookaholic

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and fold up.  Compact and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with this Shade Shack. The side pockets that you fill with sand worked great. We tightly got five of us inside and spaciously it accommodated three of us. I’m thinking about ordering the extra-large but hesitating because I wish it came in yellow. I don’t think you’ll be disappointed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Brown

customer_reviews.title: A snap to put up AND down
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product I have reviewed on Amazon. I'm writing this review because the number of complaints I read in Amazon reviews regarding the difficulty of folding the tent down almost convinced me not to buy this product. The company has provided detailed, easy to follow, written and video instructions. After reading the written instructions I was able to fold up the tent and put it in the provided bag on my first attempt and repeatedly thereafter. I'm certainly no genius.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Crossan

customer_reviews.title: Watch the video
customer_reviews.text: Didn't watch the video and couldn't figure out how to fold back up. Came home and watched the video and YAY it is so easy. It was a bit too breezy for the beach the day we used it, but will do well when it's not as windy.
customer_reviews.author: cameron w. doner

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction - failed on first day of use - seams and threading detached
customer_reviews.text: Obvious cheaply constructed Chinese product - design is excellent, however the material is extremely poor and unsuited for the beach. Would work well in the back yard or pool area. Seams came apart during the first day of use
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to fold up!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Good quality and versatile. I was intimidated by the fold up process and had concerns it might be too difficult to be worth it. I was pleasantly surprised by how easy it was to fold up!
customer_reviews.author: Robert R Lamb

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pop up shade for my grandchildren. We took it on a family trip to Hawaii and it worked perfectly. We used gallon sized ziplock bags for weighing it down on the beach amd had no problem with wind at all. The ziplock bags also keep the shade shack from being full of sand. I highly recommend this product! The only problem is the storage is cheap! It ripped the first time we used it!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Way

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: Have had tent for 2 yrs and that seems to be the shelf life. After two summers using sporadically the wiring is all messed up and won’t fold correctly. Not sure what warranty is but don’t expect it to last long. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica-Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection from the sun
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to a beach umbrella. It was very sturdy during windy conditions. The sand pockets are essential. Overall great product, nice and roomy, great design. A little tricky to take down, don't try to take it down in windy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Don't go to the beach without one!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tent last year for our son and grandchildren to use. They are returning for another beach visit this summer, and I just received an email from my son saying: "I hope that you still have your beach tent. That thing was a life saver last year. I don't think that I would take kids to the beach again without one. [My son] slept the entire time in the tent, and it's nice to just have a little shade and privacy." As a result of his email, I have ordered a second tent since we have additional children/grandchildren visiting at the same time this year. Great to hear that a product lives up to its billing!
customer_reviews.author: CindyM

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and take down! Pops up, folds down
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and take down!! It pops right up out of the carrying case and it’s easy to fold back up. It’s roomy will fit 2 - 3 people inside.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for the beach
customer_reviews.text: This fit into our suitcase (checked bag) for our recent trip to Florida. Later flat on the bottom and took up hardly any room. I watched the video first and set it up in my living room before we left - and when we got to the beach we had it set up in about 5 minutes each time. It's so simple to setup and take down, that we took it down every night and setup again every morning with no problems. I would recommend a big mat for underneath, and bring a shovel with your beach toys to fill the sides with sand faster.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy901

customer_reviews.title: Sun be beware of Shade Shack
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the Shade Shack. Was hesitant at first from reviews about folding and storing, but after a few practices it's pretty simple. It does it's job shielding the sun and is fairly big enough for a small family.
customer_reviews.author: David Thompson

customer_reviews.title: OPEN/CLOSE it before your trip... watch video... LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: TIP: Make sure to open and close it once a day before your trip!! So you have the hang of it before you get to your destination! We have used this in our yard and on a beach at a lake. We have are going to Virginia beach soon and look forward to using it again!! I am on the short side and its a little tough getting it together to put up, but if I just lay it on the ground then fold it works best. If you are having hard time folding it, watch the video, MORE THEN ONCE and it will be easy!
customer_reviews.author: N. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought, more than enough for 2 adults and 1 child
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I was expecting, we fit 2 adults and 1 sm child in it. Ridiculously easy to setup, mildly challenging to take down. Will sway in a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Definitely figure out how to fold it back up before you go anywhere. We didn't and it was a windy day at the beach with a crying newborn and my husband ended up bending the frame to get it back in the bag. My sitter and I played with it for a couple of minutes a few months later and it was so to do once we figured it out, even with the bent frame. It kept the wind out at the beach that day and offered plenty of shade to my newborn over the summer in the backyard while his big brother played. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put down
customer_reviews.text: I loved this tent!! Very easy pop up and everyone on the beach kept stopping to ask us about it but when it was time to take it down... we tried for 20 min, pulled up several videos and end up leaving it! Is not easy at all and we practice at home!
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING & GREAT SIZE!!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this might not be big enough for.our.family of 4 and almost got a.larger tent with extra work to setup. SO.GLAD I DIDN'T!!! This is perfect!! The setup is nonexistent! You literally pull it.out of the bag and begin to.move it and it pops open!! As far as collapsing, my husband got.it FIRST try!! He didn't even really look at instructions or watch the video The window shades are GREAT! to keep.them open they have little straps that secure with a toggle. No.bothering with velcro that might snag the window screen material. We are. EXTREMELY impressed and happy with this purchase!!! Our 16 month old thinks it makes a great fort in our living room too!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia D

customer_reviews.title: Its great but even the smallest breeze makes it difficult
customer_reviews.text: You need 2 people to put it up. Very difficult even with the slightest breeze. Practice folding it before you take it out. Very lightweight and a nice size.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Caserta

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We have this up over our inflatable pool. It easily opens and sets up in seconds. It stands up to the Arizona sun and comes down in under a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P

customer_reviews.title: shade shack is great
customer_reviews.text: Our shade shack is in its second season of usage. We take it to the beach every weekend when it's warm and it has held up nicely. It is very easy to set up and take down. It does fairly well in stiff winds if you orient it correctly. If you place a chair or tall bag inside it and prop it against the windward side, it will stay up in any kind of wind that wouldn't run you off the beach anyhow. There have been plenty of times that I had to take down the umbrella due to the wind but the shade shack was just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection!
customer_reviews.text: I totally love my Shade Shack! It was easy to set up, comfortable for two to sit under, and had great ventilation to keep you cool. I carried it on the airplane as my second carry-on, and it easily fit in the overhead bin. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome canopy - easy to use & great for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and very portable! Brought this on our beach vacation and it was easy to carry to the beach. Super easy to assemble and fairly easy to put back together (look at the instructions a few times). I like that the bottom is open so you can play in the sand - but it is easy to put a blanket / towel down too. It is nice to roll the window flaps up to get cross breeze too. We didn't have any issues with the wind blowing it around.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Quick pop up, practice take down before going out.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little bit to get used to folding but is easy to get used too. Quick pop up and take down when familiar to take down.
customer_reviews.author: rich n seffner

customer_reviews.title: Great Shade for Pool or Beach with Baby
customer_reviews.text: We have a 15 month old and need shade for rest and changing. This tent is perfect and so easy to set up and put away. I am even able to do it alone with the baby (which is an accomplishment in itself). I even had a few people ask me where I got it. There is not a floor to this tent, but we just lay down a a flat sheet and toss in the wash when done.
customer_reviews.author: K. VdL

customer_reviews.title: No more sunburned family!
customer_reviews.text: Leaving for the beach in one week. Practiced in the back yard- after two tries, finally have the hang of getting it folded up properly. When you know how, it is pretty intuitive. Quality materials, sturdy zipper and tabs. Larger that I expected. I'm so glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Awesome peace of mind for one season
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever used a pop-up sun shade in your car, this will be easy to use. It works well on the beach, and the sand bag feature is great. If it's very windy outside the tent will lean, but it was never a deal breaker for us. We just turned the tent. (Can't do that very easily with big tents!) **Update** This tent was destroyed by wind on the beach summer 2017
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this Tent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this beach tent!!! Its a perfect tent to travel with. We went to Puerto Rico and it fit in our luggage. It can be hard to pop up in the wind so if its a windy day do not bother. Its very easy to open and once you get the hang of it close too. All you need is some sand to anchor it. It also opens in the back to give a nice cross breeze. Would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: cindy szlaien-ng

customer_reviews.title: awesome.
customer_reviews.text: this is great. easy to carry, easy to open... kind of easy to close. its perfect. I think folding it close its just a matter of getting the hang of it. My bf can enjoy the sun and I can enjoy not broiling. win win.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Shade to myself
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I practiced how to fold a couple of times before I took it out to a beach but super easy to use and I can stay far away from other people and can still be in the shade. Getting sand out of those pockets are a little big of a pain but you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Tomoko

customer_reviews.title: Great Shade Provider!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pop up tent for shade from the beach sun when we went to Maui. It worked very well albeit Maui is a bit windy and the tent had to be repositioned a few times. In non-windy conditions though, it was wonderful to have especially for our youngest daughter who prefers shade over sun. She even napped under it! It traveled easily, too. It is too large to pack in even our largest suitcase, however, we carried it on the plane and it went through the security scanners just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Snyderstein

customer_reviews.title: great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I chose this tent over all the others because it's a pop up tent. I have a 4 month old abd like less then 10 minutes from the beach. I usually take him on my own and don't always have 2 hands so this tent is so easy to put up. I liked that it didn't have a bottom so when he's older he can build sand castles under it to get a little sun relief. The Windows on the side are awesome as well because it lets air flow through so it doesn't get to hot.
customer_reviews.author: Ericas9120

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up! Easy to breakdown!
customer_reviews.text: Our friend brought his Shade Shack tent to the beach. My husband and I were so impressed that we decided to get our own. We ended up selecting the bigger version and it's just as good! Although the plentiful sand makes it easy to use at the beach, you could use this at the park as well. It does come with accessories to stake the tent into grass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Shade Shack Beach Tent Easy Automatic Instant Pop Up Camping Sun Shelter
feature_bullets: INSTANT SET UP. The fastest set up of any beach tent on the market. Just take it out of the carrying case and let it POP UP.

COMPLETE PROTECTION. The Shade Shacks unique design has three full walls that give you more complete shading than a beach umbrella or a half dome style beach tent. The windows and the back of the tent open to keep you and your family cool. Zinc coated UPF30+ blocks over 96% of the suns harmful UV rays.
SUPER LIGHT WEIGHT AND EASY TO CARRY. Only weighs 4 pounds and comes in its own carrying case.
BIG ENOUGH FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY TO SHARE. Fits Babies, Kids, Parents and Pets. 90”W x 53”H x 51”D
Watch our video in the product photos to see the Shade Shack in action!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
